sentences.english: To provide whole blood for the production of dried plasma for the DOD War Reserve stockpile.
sentences.chinese: 向生產乾血漿的DOD戰陣儲備庫提供全血製品。

sentences.english: Completely avoid the practice of drinking uncooked poultry blood.
sentences.chinese: 徹底杜絕生食禽類血製品的習慣。
